title: Luxury at the heart of London
text:
I stayed for 7 nights about two week ago. the hotel is located within walking distance to Buckingham Place and also close enough to walk to the Westimester Abbey. The room was luxurious and the staff were very attentive. they were friendly and ensured that you had everything you needed to enjoy your stay. yet, they were discreet and gave you space when you needed it. the room was wonderfully designed and the hotel had so much finess about it that it hardly felt that you were in a hotel.
Room Tip: request for room that doesnt face the school. it can get noisy at times especially in the evenings. See more room tips
